short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resurface your Kindle highlights and remember what's important to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each time you open Google Chrome, see a quote you saved/highlighted from the books in your Kindle collection.

Why?
- Inspiration (See inspiring quotes you highlighted years ago)
- Impress yourself (Look at me! I forgot I read that book!)
- Get smarter (Remember what's meaningful to you)
